Complementary Color for Scarlet #B85042: 

Complementary colors are opposite each other on the color wheel. For Scarlet, the complementary color would be a shade of green.
Complementary Color: Green or Forest Green (#228B22)
Complementary Color for Light Olive #E7E8D1:

Complementary Color: Lavender (#E6E6FA)
Complementary Color for Light Teal #A7BEAE:

Complementary Color: Terracotta (#E2725B)
